headline: Truist (TFC) Expands Commercial Banking Teams in Ohio and Pennsylvania
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE:TFC) is one of the most undervalued financial stocks to buy, according to analysts. On June 11, the financial institution announced the expansion of its commercial banking teams in Ohio and Western Pennsylvania. The expansion is part of Truist Financial Corp’s push to generate new clients and deepen its regional relationships. The […]

headline: Truist starts on diabetes device makers, sees glucose monitor, insulin pump growth
summary: Investing.com -- Truist Securities launched coverage on four diabetes technology companies, saying there is a long-term growth potential for continuous glucose monitors (CGM) and insulin pumps amid rising adoption in both type 1 and type 2 diabetes patients.

headline: Truist names Charles Alston head of its new Nonprofit Hospitals, Higher Ed and Government banking team
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced it has hired Charles Alston as head of its new Nonprofit Hospitals, Higher Education and Government (HHG) banking team to drive focused growth and deepen client relationships.
